Package com.fssa.freshnest.dao

Class StillDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.dao.StillDAO
public class StillDAO extends Object
This class provides data access methods to interact with the stills database table.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

  • Method Details

    • createStill

      public boolean createStill(Still still) throws DAOException
      Creates a new still record in the database.
      Parameters:
      still - The Still object containing still information to be created.
      Returns:
      True if the still is successfully created, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • favouriteStill

      public boolean favouriteStill(Still still) throws DAOException
      Marks a still as favorite or not in the database.
      Parameters:
      still - The Still object containing the updated favorite status.
      Returns:
      True if the favorite status is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateStill

      public boolean updateStill(Still still) throws DAOException
      Updates a still record in the database.
      Parameters:
      still - The Still object containing updated still information.
      Returns:
      True if the still information is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • deleteStill

      public boolean deleteStill(Still still) throws DAOException
      Marks a still as deleted or not in the database.
      Parameters:
      still - The Still object containing the updated delete status.
      Returns:
      True if the delete status is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • listStills

      public List<Still> listStills(Still still) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of stills belonging to a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      still - The Still object containing the user ID for which to retrieve stills.
      Returns:
      A list of Still objects associated with the user.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • readStillDetails

      public Still readStillDetails(Still still) throws DAOException
      Read the each and every stills details
      Parameters:
      still - The still object contains the user object.
      Returns:
      The still object if that is true, Otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - throw new DAOException "No stills are found".

    • filterStills

      public List<Still> filterStills(Still still) throws DAOException
      List the still between the two dates.
      Parameters:
      still - The still list contains the user object.
      Returns:
      The still list if that is true, Otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - throw new DAOException "No stills are found".

    • filterStillsByFavourite

      public List<Still> filterStillsByFavourite(Still still) throws DAOException
      List the stills by the user's favourite.
      Parameters:
      still - The still list contains the user object.
      Returns:
      The still list if that is true, Otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - throw new DAOException "No stills are found".
